title: error in shap installation
body:
Hello!
Please help to install shap.

My system:
Python: 3.7.4 (default, Aug  9 2019, 18:34:13) [MSC v.1915 64 bit (AMD64)]
Pandas: 0.25.1

I get this error:
(base) C:\Users\OLebedev>pip install shap --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --trusted-host pypi.org

  Downloading https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/a8/77/b504e43e21a2ba543a1ac4696718beb500cfa708af2fb57cb54ce299045c/shap-0.35.0.tar.gz (273kB)
